awd_titl_txt: 1992 Brown/MIT Conference on Advanced Research in           VLSI and Parallel Systems, March 25-27, 1992, Providence,   Rhode Island
awd_abstract_narration: This is a unique conference which brings together academic and                  industrial researchers working in VLSI, architecture, CAD tools and             theory.  It provides a forum for interaction between people from                different backgrounds, with different priorities and different                  perspectives.  Parallel sessions have been avoided to allow better              sharing of information about different research topics in VLSI.                 The conference is designed to contribute to a better understanding              of the Nation's scientific and engineering research base.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division of Computing and Communication Foundations

pgm_ref.pgm_ref_txt: DES AUTO FOR MICRO & NANO SYS
